Topic.Title: Things go better with Coca Cola

Message.Msg: Maybe KO ought to buy up Twinkies, HoHos and Hostess cupcakes.

Topic.Title: Has KO reached hit highest level ever; at $40. in sep 2012?

Message.Msg: The climb was fairly steady from 2008 to till the stock split in Aug. 2012. Since then the P/E and volatility index are down. This is NOT a hot stock but a steady stock. Standard and Poors has a target of $44 in a year. That is close.
